comments.body: You'll definitely use it throughout first year. Depending on the courses you have you'll also need to use it in second and third year as well. In fact, used it for a small special topic in final year as well
I would get a graphic calculator. You dont need it for college, but it still cool as heck.
Fx 991 ex has more functions than the fx 991 es, but the es looks better and you won't need those extra functions anyway tbh. All Nyack just looks better than the white. Go for casio FX 991 es
